description: Application to vary condition 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission ref: DM2024/00778 (approved under Appeal Ref: APP/P5870/W/24/3353448) for the 'Demolition of garage and erection of an end of terraced two storey dwelling, with provision of parking and cycle and refuse stores, boundary fence to rear and side, raised patio and amenity garden area to the rear.' to allow alterations to the amenity space for new and host dwelling.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: ART4 Article 4 Direction - Boroughwide HMO Restriction

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2025/00815--- Address: 19 Riverside CloseWallingtonSM6 7DH--- Proposal: Application Reference Number: APP/P5870/W/24/3353448DM2024/00778	Date of Decision: 23/04/2025Condition Number(s): condition 2 drawings revisionsConditions(s) Removal:the applicant wish to do minor alteration to the  amenity space for host and new dwelling shown on drawing approved 10B for the ease of construction of new house.The alteration will provide the space for storage of construction materials on site without disturbing the host dwelling. minor alteration to the amenity space for host and new dwelling shown on drawing approved 10B. drawing 10B is replaced by drawing 10C.--- Status: REC--- Decision: --- Date Decision Issued: ---
